title: Bookjacket, "Bookjacket for "7 Types of Ambiguity" by Willliam Empson, Meridian Books", 1955
medium: Lithography in green, black, brown and white ink on white shiny wove paper
inscribed:
Imprinted on the cover vertically in black ink at lower right in script: lustig
Across the top in black, white and brown ink: 7 [black] types of [white]/ ambiguity [brown]/ Williams Empson [black]/ A study of its effects in English verse [white]
Across the bottom in black ink: MERIDIAN BOOKS published by The Noonday Press/ M11 $1.25
creditline: Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff
description: The bookjacket has a green background. The title, author and publisher are written vertically down the spine. The back cover has the title, author and synopsis of the book. Produced for Meridian Press.

tombstone.epitaph:
Bookjacket, "Bookjacket for "7 Types of Ambiguity" by Willliam Empson, Meridian Books", 1955.
1955. Lithography in green, black, brown and white ink on white shiny wove paper. Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff. 1993-31-181.
